Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: “Early Years” (194-1929), where we find out his past as a youth; and “Post Childhood,” (1930-1933), where he will evolve as a successful writer.
